title: Changing the optimizer fails
body:
Hi -

First of all, thanks for the great work. A fantastic tool box. I am struggling to change the optimizer. E.g.   

```
ludwig train --data_csv annotations_all_zoom.csv --model_definition "{input_features: [{name: image_path, type: image, encoder: stacked_cnn}], output_features: [{name: class, type: category}], training: {optimizer: {type: sgd, lr: 0.0004, nesterov: True}, reduce_learning_rate_on_plateau: 10, early_stop: 10, learning_rate: 0.0004, batch_size: 32}}"
```

leads to
```
 Traceback (most recent call last):  
   File "/usr/local/bin/ludwig", line 11, in <module> 
  load_entry_point('ludwig==0.1.0', 'console_scripts', 'ludwig')()  
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/cli.py", line 86, in main 
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/cli.py", line 64, in __init__
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/cli.py", line 70, in train
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/train.py", line 663, in cli
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/train.py", line 151, in full_train
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/utils/defaults.py", line 162, in merge_with_defaults
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/ludwig-0.1.0-py3.5.egg/ludwig/utils/defaults.py", line 119, in get_default_optimizer_params
ValueError: Incorrect optimizer type: sgd
```
I can call the default adam optimizer this way as well and it works. Am I missing something?
